name: The World is Mine
description:
This game was actually thought to be released with the A Game by its Cover game jam. However, I couldn't even start and I lost the schedule, so I thought it would be a good idea to mix the jams together into one new project!
I am happy with the result and I hope you too!
Enjoy! :D

Credits:

Using Fungus, Unity3D
music by mathgrant from Free Music Archive
and SFX from http://www.contralogic.com/256-nes-samples/
Cover art by yua / 会社員
